text: Scunthorpe is a town near the M180 motorway and the M181 motorway in Lincolnshire, England. The ending of the name in thorpe meaning new village in Norse, show it was a Viking settlement. Scunthorpe is often referred to as an Industrial Garden town. Scunthorpe has a population of approximately 80,000 people. Scunthorpe is famous for its steelworks. The football team is called Scunthorpe United. ==References== Category:Towns in Lincolnshire
title: Scunthorpe
